attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As fireworks can now be bought and lit all year,people with guide dogs and pets do not know when they have to bring them in or get medication for them from their vet.
Wild animals are unable to search for food as they are scared of the noise.
Rockets are now so loud they can be heard by the human ear for 5 miles, animals hearing is more acute than ours, therefore they can hear these fireworks for a much greater distance.
We would like to see a law that allows fireworks to only be lit at set times and days. For the sale of fireworks to match these dates.
Many of young children and the elderly are frightened by the noise from fireworks.
Fireworks are being mis-used.
